org.grouplens.lenskit.data.text

Interface EventFormat

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelimitedColumnEventFormat

    public interface EventFormat
    Description of how an event is laid out in a line in a text file.

    In addition to a plain parsing method, this class provides some additional methods to allow objects and/or builders to be reused for more efficient data file parsing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHeaderLines()
      Get the number of header lines to skip in the file.
      Object newContext()
      Create a new context that may speed up parsing.
      Event parse(String line)
      Parse a line into an event.
      Event parse(String line, Object context)
      Parse using a context.

    • Method Detail

      • getHeaderLines

        int getHeaderLines()
        Get the number of header lines to skip in the file.

      • parse

        Event parse(String line)
     throws InvalidRowException
        Parse a line into an event.
        Parameters:
        line - The line to parse.
        Returns:
        The event resulting from parsing the line.
        Throws:
        InvalidRowException

      • newContext

        Object newContext()
        Create a new context that may speed up parsing. This will be passed to parse(String, Object); will usually be a builder to be reused.

        The context will only ever be used from one thread.

        Returns:
        The context.

      • parse

        Event parse(String line,
            Object context)
     throws InvalidRowException
        Parse using a context.
        Parameters:
        line - The line to parse.
        context - The parsing context.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        InvalidRowException
